name: Fast Offroad Bike Racing Fever
description:
Fast Offroad Bike Racing Fever X3 is a action packed, stunt filled motocross game as you star as a tough offroad motorbike rider. You will feel like you’re really steering your motorbike through the dirt, deserts, and hills.
Features:
Smooth and easy controls
Multiple levels
Stunning 3D and high quality graphics
Good Physics and controls
Amazing 3D sound effects
